title.narrative: Mozambique Public Financial Management for Results Program

description.narrative: The Program Development Objective is to improve the transparency and efficiency of expenditures for the storage, distribution and availability of medicines and for more transparent and accountable management of Complete Primary Schools

participating-org.narrative: Ministry of Economy and Finance, Republic of Mozambique

condition.narrative: Finance Agreement :FA Article IV 4.01 | Description :The Additional Condition of Effectiveness consists of the following, namelythat the Program Operations Manual shall havebeen adopted by the Recipient in a manner satisfactory to the Association. | Due Date:19-Sep-2014

Finance Agreement :FA Schedule II Section V (a) | Description :Provide annual summary reports in respect of the capacity buildingactivities for sector and PFM institutions to confirm that all proposals have first been jointly agreed by the relevant PFMinstitution and, as appropriate, by the MoE or MoH. | Frequency :Yearly

Finance Agreement :FA Schedule II Section V (b) | Description :Maintain the Norms for disposal of pharmaceutical products (theNorms), comprising detailed acceptable methods of disposal by category and volume of pharmaceuticals, and necessary environmental,health & safety conditions, and other requirements... | Frequency :CONTINUOUS

Finance Agreement :FA Schedule II Section V (c) | Description :Develop pharmaceutical disposal plans for each type of facilityconsistent with the Norms, and determine the requirements for equipment, training and reporting of pharmaceutical product disposalsmade (products, volumes and their place & disp method. | Due Date :30-Sep-2015

Finance Agreement :FA Schedule II Section V (d) | Description :Provide an annual summary report detailing pharmaceutical productsdisposed of by facilities, their volumes, and places and methods of disposal in accordance with the Norms. | Frequency :Yearly

Finance Agreement :FA Schedule II Section V (e) | Description :Provide a report detailing activities undertaken at the Recipient'sprovincial and district levels to disseminate information to the public regarding the mechanisms and procedures for complaintshandling in the health and education sectors. | Frequency :Yearly

Finance Agreement :FA Schedule II Section V (f) | Description :Provide a report for each procurement of medicines under theFinancing confirming that each such procurement has been carried out in accordance with the Quality-Assurance Protocol. | Frequency:CONTINUOUS
